satellite.heading: Isathelayithi
satellite.specs:
Imilinganiselo: 50x58x64 mm
1P PocketQube
Ubunzima: 245 gr
Izixhobo: i-aluminium, igolide, i-fiberglass, kunye nezinto ze-elektroniki.
I-Orbit: Ubude be-525 ± 25 km; utyekelo: SSO 97.6 ± 0.1°
Umqalisi: I-PSLV (Isithuthi sokuQaliswa kweSathelayithi yePolar) siqhutywa yi-ISRO

antenna.heading: I-Antenna / Umfanekiso oqingqiweyo
antenna.specs:
Imilinganiselo: 6 m (ububanzi) e 1.2m (ubude)
Ubunzima: 46 kg
Izinto eziphathekayo: i-aluminiyam, ibhodi ye-epoxy mirrored, idome ye-aluminium yegolide exhonywe kwi-scaffolding structure.

radio.heading: Imiba yeRadio
radio.specs:
Ikhonkco ezantsi: 468.5 MHz
Uhlengahlengiso: CSS
Ububanzi: TBD
